title: Ye Wenfu
text: Ye Wenfu is a Chinese poet born in 1944. He worked in the military and was later "struggled" against and criticized by officials. He has been critical of <a href="communist">communist</a> policies and officials. He wrote the poem "General, you can't do this". Ye was imprisoned for 17 months after the 1989 Tiananmen protests. He contributed to "<a href="Mao%27s%20Harvest">Mao's Harvest</a>: Voices from China's New Generation".
